allow:
Bash(git commit --no-gpg-sign -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add project documentation and coding standards.

- `CLAUDE.md`: Project preferences, architecture overview, and coding standards
- `README.md`: User-facing documentation with usage examples and feature descriptions
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit --no-gpg-sign -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add AWS Connect client infrastructure.

Implements `createConnectClient()` to create AWS SDK v3 Connect clients with profile-based credentials for cross-account support.
EOF
)")
